titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: MRI Scan - Description

body.p: A MRI Scan is a Clinical Investigation .
A MRI Scan ( Magnetic Resonance Imaging Scan ) is a type of scan that is often used to diagnose health conditions that affect organs, TISSUES and bone.
A MRI Scan uses strong magnetic fields and radio waves to produce a detailed image of the inside of the body.
For further information on MRI Scans , see the NHS website at: MRI scan .
